channel.title: slowcooker on Matt's Musings
channel.description: Recent content in slowcooker on Matt's Musings

item.title: Bacon Brown Sugar Chicken
item.description: Ingredients # 2 lbs chicken 1/2 lbs bacon 1/2 cup brown suger Directions # Toss chicken in brown sugar.

item.title: Caesar Chicken
item.description: Ingredients # 2 lbs chicken 1/2 cup parmesan cheese 1 bottle caesar dressing Directions # Place all ingredients in slowcooker and cook on low for 6 hours.

item.title: Cheesy Chicken & Rice
item.description: Ingredients # 2 lbs chicken salt pepper 1 can corn 1 cap cream of chicken soup 1 cup cheddar cheese 8 oz rice Directions # Cook chicken and soup in slowcooker on low for 6 hours.

item.title: Chicken & Dumpling Soup
item.description: Ingredients # 1 large onion, diced 1 can cream of celery soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 tbsp fresh parsley 1 tsp poultry seasoning 4 skinless boneless chicken breasts 2 cups chicken broth 2 cups frozen mixed vegetables 1 can refrigerated biscuits pepper Directions # Add onion to slowcooker and top with chicken.

item.title: Chicken Parm Tortellini
item.description: Ingredients # 2 cups chicken broth 2 lbs chicken 1 lbs tortellini 1 cup mozzarella cheese 1/2 cup breadcrumbs 1 jar pasta sauce 1 tbsp butter 1/2 cup parmesan cheese salt pepper Directions # Mix sauce, broth, salt and pepper in slowcooker.

item.title: Chicken Tortellini Soup
item.description: Ingredients # 9 ounces cheese tortellini 1 pound chicken breasts 6 cups chicken broth 1 diced onion 1 tsp minced garlic 1 tsp parsley 1/2 tsp pepper 3/4 tsp salt 3 sliced carrots 1/2 tsp thyme Directions # Place the diced onion, sliced carrots, chicken breasts, minced garlic, salt, pepper, thyme, parsley and chicken broth into the slow cooker.

item.title: Chicken Tortilla Soup
item.description: Ingredients # 15 ounces chicken stock 1 tsp chili powder 1 large can cooked chicken some crispy tortilla chips 1 tsp cumin 4 ounces diced green chili 10 ounces enchilada sauce 10 ounces frozen corn 2 tsp garlic 1 medium onion 1/4 tsp pepper 15 ounces petite diced tomatoes 1 tsp salt 2 cups water Directions # Place cooked chicken, petite diced tomatoes, enchilada sauce, medium onion, diced green chili and garlic into the slow cooker.

item.title: Chocolate Covered Peanuts
item.description: Ingredients # 16 oz salted peanuts 12 oz semisweet chocolate chips 12 oz milk chocolate chips 10 oz peanut butter chips 1 lbs white almond bark or vanilla candy coating Directions # Layer all ingredients into a slowcooker starting with the peanuts.

item.title: Ham & Potato Soup
item.description: Ingredients # 8 cups russet potatoes, diced 1 yellow onion 2 large carrots, peeled and chopped 1/2 cup chopped celery 16 oz cubed ham 1 tsp salt 1/4 tsp pepper 1/4 cup flour 4 cups chicken broth 1-1/2 cups heavy cream 1/2 cup sour cream Directions # Add potatoes, onion, carrot, celery, ham, salt, pepper and chicken broth to the slowcooker and cook on low for 7 - 8 hours or high for 4 - 5 hours.

item.title: Hamburger Hash
item.description: Ingredients # 1 lbs ground beef 1 can corn 1 cup cheese 1 tsp garlic powder 1-1/2 lbs potatoes 1 can cream of mushroom soup Directions # Dice potatoes and place in slowcooker.

item.title: Honey Chicken
item.description: Ingredients # 2 lbs chicken 1 cup honey 1 cup yellow mustard 1 packet of italian seasoning garlic powder Directions # Whisk honey, mustard and seasoning together.

item.title: Meatballs with White Gravy
item.description: Ingredients # 1 package frozen meatballs 16 oz sour cream 1 can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup 1 cup milk egg noodles Directions # Mix together sour cream, cream of mushroom soup and milk, then add to slowcooker.

item.title: Queso Chicken
item.description: Ingredients # 2 lbs chicken 1 jar queso 1 jar salsa 1 tsp garlic powder Directions # Cook chicken in slowcooker on low for 6 hours.

item.title: Slowcooker Mac & Cheese
item.description: Ingredients # 4 ounces block american cheese 12 ounces block cheddar cheese 1/4 cups butter cayenne pepper cold water 1/2 tsp dry mustard 1 pound elbow pasta 12 ounces evaporated milk 1/4 tsp garlic powder 2-1/2 cups milk non-stick spray 1/2 tsp pepper 1 tsp salt Directions # Spray 6-quart slow cooker with non-stick spary.

item.title: Taco Pasta
item.description: Ingredients # 1 lbs ground beef 1 package taco seasoning 1 can rotel 2 cups cheddar cheese 1/2 cup water 1 lbs shell pasta 4 oz cream cheese Directions # Place all ingredients in slowcooker and cook on low for 6 hours.
